movie.title: King of the World
movie.plot: The early career of boxer Muhammad Ali, then known as Cassius Clay, as he prepares for a title fight against Sonny Liston, while struggling to come to terms with his private and public personas.

events.title: Muhammad Ali beats Sonny Liston to become heavyweight champion of the world
